where (title like CONCAT('%',#{searchInput},'%') or content like CONCAT('%',#{searchInput},'%'))
where b.name like CONCAT('%',#{searchInput},'%')
where DATE_FORMAT(a.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') like CONCAT('%',#{searchInput},'%')
order by id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
